website_summaries.verdict: These finger pinch guards are conveniently designed to remain on doors, so there's no need to worry about misplacing them in between use.
pros: Sliding foam bumper can be toggled "on" and "off" without removing the entire guard
Protects door frames from dings and dents
Slip on design is quick and easy to install
cons: Might be a tight fit on thicker doors

customer_reviews.title: Genius! So happy I came across this item.
customer_reviews.text: Love this! My toddler is constantly trying to close the back door. I like that I can leave this attached to the door and just flip it around when I don’t want her closing the door and smashing her fingers, and flip it back around when I want to close the door for awhile. I don’t have to try to keep track of where I put it. It wasn’t what I expected when I got it, but it does a great job. Highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: AimarooniTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: These things are great. My kids love to slam doors and the ...
customer_reviews.text: These things are great. My kids love to slam doors and the foam guards kept breaking. Unfortunately, since they like to slam doors, I can foresee a little damage to the trim when the hard plastic hits it... but I didn't expect to have a pristine house after two boys. They stay in place. I don't have to remove them when I want to shut the door completely (and have my kids hide them from me). They have already taken a beating and not broken (metal piece over the door & hard plastic c-shaped bumper).
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for keeping doors open and preventing pets from being locked in a room
customer_reviews.text: These work so well for keeping the doors open to a bedroom. My kids often accidentally close doors they shouldn’t such as the door to the litter box room or they accidentally lock the cat in a room when they shut a door. These door stoppers have prevented this and are super easy to use. There is no hardware and they are as simple as sliding on the side of the door! I put them up high to prevent my little one from taking it off.
customer_reviews.author: Momofthreeboys

customer_reviews.title: Great product for any kid that loves to play with doors!
customer_reviews.text: Great safety guard for our two boys (4 and 2 years old). We have the bought that U-shaped foam guards that can be taken off the door so it will close, those get misplaced. These guards are great, they stop the door from closing all the way, protecting our son's fingers (because they love to slam doors). They can be turned upwards so the door can close fully. We have not had a problem with these. We have bought 2 packages because they are so easy to install/use and are efficient.
customer_reviews.author: R.Rosco

customer_reviews.title: Love Them
customer_reviews.text: I have now bought them three times. I really like these. We put them at the top of the bedroom doors to keep them open just enough for the cat to get in/out and still provide privacy, plus the pet doesny Three things I really like are the ability to place them in multiple positions to change the door opening, the ease with which they fit snuggly over our tight doors without dinging the door frame, the ability to just twist the foam wedge out of the way. No need to remove it entirely. Big fan.
customer_reviews.author: J. O.

customer_reviews.title: Great product.  Would recommend.
customer_reviews.text: These are great, and I love how they flip open and closed so you don’t have to remove them when you want to close the door. The only thing I can’t vouch for is how much they will hold up over time because I’ve only had them for a month. So far so good! I would recommend these, and my friend always ask where I got them when they come over.
customer_reviews.author: Alexandra C

customer_reviews.title: A must have for toddlers and interior doors
customer_reviews.text: Just what I needed! I was hoping for something sturdy and safe. The foam is strong and doesn't collapse even with my toddler putting his whole weight on the door. I would highly recommend this product for all standard inside doors that you would like to keep open and use frequently. (It does not work on the front door due to its thickness. But it works great on standard interior doors.)
customer_reviews.author: singit

customer_reviews.title: Great idea, only so so build quality
customer_reviews.text: Great idea, only so so build quality. I would love to give this item 5 stars since it works well and is a lot more convenient than the foam bumpers which can be a choking hazard if chewed on by little ones or the Door Monkey product which can be irritating to use on bathroom doors where privacy is needed. Not so convinced that these will stand the test of time though... the build quality is a bit flimsy for something that will be flipped back and forth repeatedly. I bought half a dozen of these and if most last more a year I will revise my review to 5 stars. Hope this helps someone out there!
customer_reviews.author: Gill Wong

customer_reviews.title: The very best door stops!
customer_reviews.text: I bought three different types of door bumpers since I have a 4 year old and a 1 year old that wants to follow her older sister into every room. These are by far my favorite and I went back and ordered more. The other foam kinds are garbage and get lost. I like that these stay on the door and a simple flip one way allows the door to close and the other way will serve as a door stop. I put mine up where the kids can't reach them and they save little fingers.
customer_reviews.author: Arabella'sMommy

customer_reviews.title: Flimsy Non-stop
customer_reviews.text: Flimsy plastic that broke after just a few days and allowed the door to close even before it broke (making it pointless).
customer_reviews.author: EGM

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for many reasons
customer_reviews.text: These are perfect. As foster parents in NJ you have to get your house inspected. We dont like 'closed' doors, especially for Teenagers. But we have to offer them privacy. These passed inspection with the state for allowing privacy (when you flip back the blocker) but allows the door to remain ajar at all other times. This is important for heat and AC (If you have forced air) as well as ensuring your at risk youth is still accessible.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: I could not find a door stopper that didn’t break.!! My son is crazy with my doors and I get scared .! I love these so much they work great and you don’t have to remove them from the door .!!
customer_reviews.author: christi

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit & easy to use
customer_reviews.text: When baby proofing your home, you'll likely try out many products. These tend to be a bit on the pricier side, but they are so easy to use and functional on all our doorways, well worth the purchase. Even guests will be able to figure this baby proof item with ease.
customer_reviews.author: Day

customer_reviews.title: Nice concept but poor design
customer_reviews.text: These haven't lasted 2 weeks with my toddlers. The foam top is smashed and deformed and they figured out all the have to do is try to close the door multiple times and the foam block will soon down and they can then fully shut the door. Will not purchase again or recommend
customer_reviews.author: KB

customer_reviews.title: ... to slamming her bedroom door so this is the perfect solution to prevent her from doing that and potentially ...
customer_reviews.text: My 16 month old has taken to slamming her bedroom door so this is the perfect solution to prevent her from doing that and potentially hurting her fingers. I really like that you can flip up the safety so that the door can be closed when need be too. Install was zero effort-it just fits on to your door and is ready to go. Love that you get 2 in a package too!
customer_reviews.author: Donella R.

customer_reviews.title: Recommended
customer_reviews.text: These are surprisingly nice. Have only had them on my bathroom and kids' bedroom door for a couple days but they are easy to switch back and forth between letting the door close and keeping little hands from being slammed in a door. I have 3 year old twins and one day last week, one got her finger smashed by the other one slamming the door on her, so I came to Amazon looking for something to keep this from happening again. I'm pleased with this purchase so far!
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This does the job - keep the door from closing on tiny fingers. But the real bonus is that it stays on the door. My little ones run off with the other style door stops when they are not in use and I can never find them when needed... Very pleased!
customer_reviews.author: MSK

customer_reviews.title: As expected
customer_reviews.text: Just received this. It seems to do what it’s made to do, but I haven’t used it long enough to say whether it will hold up well. It slides on the edge of the door easily and the door closes fine.
customer_reviews.author: SpedAisd

customer_reviews.title: won't stay on
customer_reviews.text: One of them will stay on, but the other will not attach properly unless I use some kind of adhesive, which I don't want to do. They are a good idea but rather flimsy.
customer_reviews.author: Busy RN

customer_reviews.title: Great idea not so good execution
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to love this, but it didn’t work for us. The plastic part that hooks onto the door is super thin and didn’t hold up well.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie O.

customer_reviews.title: Just what we needed
customer_reviews.text: What we really needed was something to allow the cat access to the bathroom (for his litter box), but prevent him from locking himself inside (he likes to close doors). Any regular door stop would work, but it was really inconvenient to keep removing them and adding them back when we needed to use the bathroom for ourselves. This stop was exactly what we were looking for. It's easy to open and close, and if you install it right at eye level you won't forget about it when you go in and out.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Grad

customer_reviews.title: Worked
customer_reviews.text: Works great. I no longer have to worry about my son slamming the doors on his fingers, but they’re so easy to just side out of the way, that I’ve just left them on the door.
customer_reviews.author: Brittney Hantak

customer_reviews.title: Product that works
customer_reviews.text: I like this product so much that I bought two more sets to use on other doors. We have been using the foam stoppers and have to keep buying new ones fairly quickly after they are installed. I think this product will last a lot longer. It is sturdy and since you can leave it in place there is less risk of breaking it when taking it on and off. Of course, if a kid slams the door hard enough it might still break, but with normal use this should last a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Chefmats

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product
customer_reviews.text: Great finger protection. These are easy to install and don’t require removal to shut the door securely when needed. Just the ticket to prevent a toddler from smashing her fingers while still being able to shut the door for bedtime.
customer_reviews.author: ammaro

customer_reviews.title: Did the job!
customer_reviews.text: These little gems did just what I hoped. They also looked decent. A little pricey compared to other items which do the same thing, but I'm glad I chose these.
customer_reviews.author: Stevo Lambo

customer_reviews.title: This is one of the best purchases I have ever made
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the best purchases I have ever made. My 1 year old to play in his room but also loves to slam his door shut. Now I am able to leave his door open for him to play and don't have to worry about his fingers getting slammed.
customer_reviews.author: S.Prorok

customer_reviews.title: I wanted to like these. They’re unobtrusive
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to like these. They’re unobtrusive, and the concept is good, but my 14 month old just pushes a little harder and closes the door anyway. They’re like a suggestion, rather than really blocking it. Stick with the big ugly foam circles if you really need to keep your doors from closing.
customer_reviews.author: Haley B

customer_reviews.title: LOVE these, I didn't want to have to deal ...
customer_reviews.text: LOVE these, I didn't want to have to deal with taking on and off a door guard and potentially forgetting to put it on. These eliminate that issue and can handle a 2 yr old constantly slamming them against door frame without budging!
customer_reviews.author: franki

customer_reviews.title: not as sturdy as I though
customer_reviews.text: They do the trick! Not has sturdy as I thought they would be- a bit cheaper, but they do exactly what they need to do. They are also not very noticeable!
customer_reviews.author: Hannah Pennington

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: My 2 year old loves shutting her door. Luckily she has never slammed her fingers in it, but as a mother I was afraid she would hurt herself. After trying many failed products this became my last resort. It was very easy to slip on her door and even with all of her door slamming it has held up. I will definitely be purchasing more.
customer_reviews.author: 2LS

customer_reviews.title: Work as Expected
customer_reviews.text: These work well. It's nice that you can flip them so that the door can shut without taking the guard off the door. They only work on interior doors though. I tried to put one on the front door, but the door was too wide. They are smaller than I expected, but I love how they do not stand out on our doors.
customer_reviews.author: Faith

customer_reviews.title: Works as promised, easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Works as promised. Attaches to any part of the door and keeps it from shutting. Easy on and off with no marks on door. I ordered this for the laundry room door so it won't shut the kitty out from her litter box. Comes in a pack of two. Great value.
customer_reviews.author: Kel T.

customer_reviews.title: The rubber gripper in the back just peeled away from ...
customer_reviews.text: The rubber gripper in the back just peeled away from regular use. This product is designed so poorly to never work more than a months use.
customer_reviews.author: User

customer_reviews.title: Perfect.  Love it.
customer_reviews.text: These safety guards are easy to install and work like a charm. My three year old and 18 month old share a room, and sometimes need help to no harm one another. After fitting one of these guards on their door, my husband "slammed" it for 10 minutes straight just to watch the door bounce. It was great.
customer_reviews.author: PopTart

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I wanted!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect! We put these on the laundry room door where we keep the cats litter box. Now the kids can't accidentally lock the cats out! But I can easily flip it and close it when company visits. Exactly what I wanted! Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Deborah

customer_reviews.title: A must for high-traffic doors
customer_reviews.text: Perfect finger protection on high-traffic doors. The easy "on/off" flip is exactly what a busy family needs that can't keep track of some other types that have to be removed entirely to accomplish the on/off task. This doesn't protect fingers from being pinched in the door jam though, just FYI. The only improvement that I would love to see is some type of thin foam coating on the "switch" so that while it is in the "on" position, it isn't so abrasive when it makes contact with the door frame.
customer_reviews.author: Josh Shupp

customer_reviews.title: Keeps doors from closing or lets them close as you wish!
customer_reviews.text: These are pretty cool, they just look a little chintzy. Definitely keeps my kid from slamming the doors closed without having to pin them open with a door stop.
customer_reviews.author: Heartofthematter

customer_reviews.title: Prevents smashed fingers and stuck doors!
customer_reviews.text: Love this thing! Fits on the door great at any height I want. I bought it because sometimes the bathroom door sticks and my 3 year old can't open it when she needs to go, with this on the door it can't shut or get stuck . This is so much better than the door things you have to take completely off in order to shut because it stays on the door all the time so it won't get lost ! Would absolutely recommend and buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t last long.
customer_reviews.text: It barely lasted us a month or so. The part that moves broke on us pretty soon than expected. Poor quality product
customer_reviews.author: Harshal Patel

customer_reviews.title: Just the gadget I was looking for!
customer_reviews.text: Fit over my basement door perfectly and now my cat has access to his litter box. No chance of him being accidentally locked out from someone shutting the door.
customer_reviews.author: Leezel

customer_reviews.title: It works great
customer_reviews.text: It works perfectly. Just what I was looking for. No worries anymore!!
customer_reviews.author: James Garriti

customer_reviews.title: These fit the door great, and stop my son from smashing his little ...
customer_reviews.text: These fit the door great, and stop my son from smashing his little fingers in the door! It's such a simple design. Definitely recommend
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Calka

customer_reviews.title: Awesome.
customer_reviews.text: We are just moving into a house and have a 1 year old. THESE ARE AWESOME! They required NO hardware or drilling into our new doors--the door can close and open easily when wanted--and my son is in no danger of shutting his fingers in the door! Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea

customer_reviews.title: These are great. We glued some kind of cushion on them ...
customer_reviews.text: These are great. We glued some kind of cushion on them because when the doors slam with these on it's a pretty hard whack to the door frame. But I really like them. With some improvement to the plastic stopper these would be perfect. However if you don't have a five year old running around slamming doors they would probably be just fine as is.
customer_reviews.author: K. Mars

customer_reviews.title: This works well in stopping the door from closing all ...
customer_reviews.text: This works well in stopping the door from closing all the way. It moves quickly from open to close.
customer_reviews.author: Bepobas

customer_reviews.title: Is the perfect solution to keep my cats from locking themselves in ...
customer_reviews.text: Works as expected. Is the perfect solution to keep my cats from locking themselves in bedrooms and bathrooms. Is perfect for the bathroom so the door can be easily shut when in use.
customer_reviews.author: Emily K

customer_reviews.title: Simple & perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Great concept & so easy to use! Perfect for keeping little ones from being able to close doors! We have them all over the house!
customer_reviews.author: WMo

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work properly.
customer_reviews.text: If your child bang his door, this thing will move and make it possible, there for it doesn't do what it should.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: Two different sizes
customer_reviews.text: Clearly two different sizes and the smaller one doesn't work because they used a smaller pad and the screw is coming out of it which makes it loose when it the door. Great idea but doesn't work well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: These are so simple yet amazing! Easy to flip around if you want the door closed or open.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: great deal, easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use, works as described, and when you don't want the child guard on you keep the guard in place and just flip the plastic part over- so easy to use. Buying more!
customer_reviews.author: Bugaboo

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant!
customer_reviews.text: These things are amazing! They are easy to use and fit on most doors. I am thrilled that my toddler won't be able to pinch his fingers but also won't be able to shut himself in the bathroom anymore and then cry because he can't yet work the door knob. Thank you for this product! Recommending it to all my friends!
customer_reviews.author: Niki Z.

customer_reviews.title: Super buy!
customer_reviews.text: These fit the door well, but still allow us to close the door when needed. They are sturdy and affordable. They keep our toddler from locking herself in or out of her bedroom. We may even get more for some other rooms of the house. Great buy!

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I use these so my cats can always reach their litter box!

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Super flimsy. Pops off of door. Can't close door with this attached. Waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: a.c.r.

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant product to prevent injuries
customer_reviews.text: This is genius. Got it after toddler picked fingers in a door and installed these right away. This little product is peace of mind.

customer_reviews.title: I love the turning feature
customer_reviews.text: A bit flimsy but it works well. I love the turning feature.
customer_reviews.author: Featherluv

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I needed!
customer_reviews.text: Just as described. I feel safer now with these on my doors to protect my little ones fingers. Just what I was looking for. Simple slide on and off the door and can remove and take it with you when traveling. Might buy another pair. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: MW

customer_reviews.title: Love these! I'm going to replace all of my ...
customer_reviews.text: Love these! I'm going to replace all of my foam removable door stops with these. It's just so convenient not having to remove them every time you want to s*** the door.

customer_reviews.title: These are absolutely perfect. I love the design
customer_reviews.text: These are absolutely perfect. I love the design, especially that I do not have to take them off the door (and figure out where to store them.)

customer_reviews.title: Good product for the right type of door
customer_reviews.text: Good product but make sure you don't have european style doors. They won't work. I am keeping these for when we return to the usa.

customer_reviews.title: An okay product.
customer_reviews.text: Not that thrilled about these. They can mark up the door and door frame. But they work to prevent children from getting hurt.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These are genius and wfor to great for our 1-4 yr olds

customer_reviews.text: Luv it. Didn't realize it stays attached and flips so door can close. Great for our family.

customer_reviews.title: Works as described
customer_reviews.text: These worked very well for our home to keep toddlers from closing the door to the playroom on each other.
customer_reviews.author: Desert Dweller

customer_reviews.title: These work great. Just slide one onto the door and flip ...
customer_reviews.text: These work great. Just slide one onto the door and flip the stopper open. The door stays open about an inch or so and stops fingers from getting pinched. Super easy and does what it is supposed to do.
customer_reviews.author: Sara Moore

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use and works well. It grips tightly on the door so it doesn't slip off or down.

customer_reviews.text: our toddler loves to open and close doors. These prevent fingers getting slammed in doors but can easily be disabled when doors need to be closed.

customer_reviews.text: It's held up so far with two toddlers under 3.

customer_reviews.title: Super easy, sleek, and useful.
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product. It slips on the door easily but is a snug fit...looks sleek, too. Gives me and my husband peace of mind when our kids are running around. Planning to get some for all of our doors.

customer_reviews.title: Great product

customer_reviews.title: great
customer_reviews.text: easy to put on easy to use works like a charm

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what we needed! Non marking and secure!
customer_reviews.text: So easy to use. I was looking for something that was not a permanent product. This is so easy to install and works beautifully. Perfect!
customer_reviews.author: DeDo529

customer_reviews.title: Works great. You can leave it on your door all ...
customer_reviews.text: Works great. You can leave it on your door all the time and then just flip it between blocking and not blocking. I have old school doors and it just fits over them. If your doors are abnormally thick they may not work.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Brainerd

customer_reviews.title: like that you can rotate the pad material to close ...
customer_reviews.text: Works well to keep door cracked open, like that you can rotate the pad material to close door. Works as described.

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: Simple design - we use them to make sure our cats don't get trapped in a room when we're away. Works great!
customer_reviews.author: Kristina S

customer_reviews.title: Easy to Use
customer_reviews.text: A win for mommy! Love these. Easy to slip on, no permanent installation and when I need the door to close they flip right over without a sound. If only all baby proofing was this easy!!
customer_reviews.author: Amber Kelley

customer_reviews.title: I love that I just flip it to close the door
customer_reviews.text: I thought I would teach my kids not to slam doors, but that's a dangerous thing I have realized because I was risking my one year olds fingers. These have been a finger saver. I love that I just flip it to close the door. We have 1950s doors without much of a gap between the door and the door frame and these are slim enough to fit. Definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: A Neub

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These work great! Great value, easy to install. I bought 10 packages!
customer_reviews.author: Building Blocks Learning Center

customer_reviews.title: Good idea, but damages door finishes
customer_reviews.text: It's a clever idea, and I wanted to like them, but I ultimately had to return them. The flip design is great, but they damaged my doors and my door frames. The clips will scratch the paint on the door (especially noticeable on a white door...I'm going to have to touch up the paint), and if the door is accidentally closed with much force, the bumpers will dent door frames made of soft wood. If they made these with less scratchy clips and softer bumpers I'd likely buy them again.
customer_reviews.author: C. Decker

customer_reviews.title: i have a simpler rubber guard which i like a little
customer_reviews.text: it scratched my door; i may have to put some felt or fabric between the clip; i have a simpler rubber guard which i like a little better
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works great as a door stop or to prevent finger smashes.
customer_reviews.text: I use these at home for the kids and recently purchased them for my classroom door. Other teachers wanted them too so this is my second order. Comes with 2, but order lots!
customer_reviews.author: T

customer_reviews.title: Not the right fit
customer_reviews.text: I was hoping these would work on my bedroom or patio doors, but they did not fit either. They were a waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cats not kids
customer_reviews.text: Keeps the door open about 2", not quite enough for my purpose which was to keep a door open for the cats. Hoping they will learn to push through it. This wasn't the purpose of the product but you cat people should know, going to have to hope on retraining. Otherwise the snap-back design works well so you can close the door and leave it on the door at all times. We'll see.
customer_reviews.author: C Hires

product_meta.title: 2 Pk Door Finger Safety Guard Slip-on Foam Bumper Stop. Flips On/Off. by PinchNot
product_meta.description: This extraordinary product is an inexpensive and effective device to prevent injuries at the handle-side of a door. This extraordinary product is referred to by various generic names, including a door finger guard, a door pinch guard, a finger pinch guard, a finger guard for a door, a finger door guard, or a door finger protector. Sometimes these names are preceded by the word “child” - e.g., child finger guard, child door guard, child door finger guard, child door finger protector, or just child door finger protection. Regardless of the name, the objective of a finger guard for door is always the same - achieving child door safety. A finger door guard (also called a door finger guard) should be installed in any area where toddlers or young children come into contact with hinged doors. A door finger protector provides protection to little fingers, and peace of mind to parents. This product fits all doors and is an inexpensive and effective device to prevent injuries at the handle-side of a door. Installation takes only 10 seconds with no tools required. The slip-on design does not use adhesive. The foam bumper toggles on and off – enabling the door to close when desired. And, there is no danger of misplacing the device because it remains with the door, even in an "off" position. The plastic clip will not scratch the door, and the foam bumper will not dent or mar the door frame. Simply ingenious! Child proof your home today! Other descriptive terms include: door safety for kids, baby door safety, door safety baby, door safety child, door safety devices, door safety for toddlers, door safety for baby, door safety guard, and door safety toddler.
feature_bullets: Protects against finger accidents at the handle-side of a door
10-second installation, no tools required, slip-on design does not use adhesive
Toggles on/off while remaining on the door
Plastic clip ensures no scratching of door
Foam bumper avoids denting of door frame

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.1 out of 5 stars133 ratings4.1 out of 5 stars
